entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 1:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
